topic.title: Exercise: quer025 - Parameter chocolate type pralines

section.p: There are several types of chocolate types for the pralines: Butterscotch, Milk, Dark, Toffee and White. Create a parameter query to show the pralines whose type is requested during the execution of the query. Show ChocolateType, PralineName, PralineCosts and PralineDescription. Name the query quer025.

section.title: Solution
section.p: Create a new query with Query Design. Add table Pralines. Add the fields ChocolateType, PralineName, PralineCosts and PralineDescription. Type in row Criteria in column ChocolateType in: [Enter chocolate type].
